income_messages:
From: p***********f@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-14 04:12:51
SUBJECT: Greetings,
Greetings,
How have you been doing? I will like you to confirm the receipt of my
last email to you in regards for you to stand as my late client next
of kin,so that we will work together for the inheritance funds to be
release to you since you have the same last name with my late client.
I wait for your response.
Regards
Peter
From: p***********f@gmail.com
To: kp75640@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 08:23:28
SUBJECT: My proposal in detail
Dear Marie Rosenberg,
Firstly, I must solicit your confidence in this transaction; this is by
virtue of its nature as being utterly confidential. Though I know that a
transaction of this magnitude will make any one apprehensive and worried,
but I am assuring you that there will be absolutely nothing to worry about
as all will be smooth and swift.
There is an unclaimed “permanent life insurance policy” insured for Ten
Million Nine Hundred & Fifty Thousand Dollars (US$ 10,950,000.00) with a
top Life Insurance Company in Toronto, Canada. The policy holder was one of
our clients, Eng. Anthony Rosenberg, who worked with Energy Company here in
Toronto, Canada. He died in an accident years ago. Since his death no one
has come forward for the claim and all our efforts to locate his relatives
have proved unsuccessful.
The insurance company code stipulates that “insured permanent policies" not
claimed must be turned over to the abandoned property division of the state
after some years.
Therefore, I ask for your consent to be in partnership with me for the
claim of this policy benefit, in view of the fact that you share the same
last name, nationality and background with the deceased. If you permit me
to add your name to the policy, all proceeds will be processed on your
behalf. I wish to point out that I want 10% of this money to be shared
among charity organizations while the remaining 90% will be shared between
us.
This is 100% risk free; I do have all necessary documentation to expedite
the process in a highly professional and confidential manner. I will
provide all the relevant documents to substantiate your claim as the
beneficiary. This claim requires a high level of confidentiality and it may
take up to thirty 30 business days, from the date of receipt of your
consent.
Your earliest response to this matter would be highly appreciated.
Regards,
Peter
From: p***********f@gmail.com
To: kp75640@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 12:47:31
SUBJECT: Re: My proposal in detail
Dear Marie Rosenberg,
Thank you for your swift response. There is no one else involved
externally. I am working with my team of professionals. My contact who is
inside the insurance company will be working with me to ensure that the
process is smooth and hitch free. Feel free to work with me as every
information I have provided to you is highly confidential.
Peter
From: p***********f@gmail.com
To: kp75640@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-22 11:40:21
SUBJECT: Re: Greetings,
Marie Rosenberg,
I would like a number to speak with you directly.
Peter
From: p***********f@gmail.com
To: kp75640@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-24 07:09:38
SUBJECT: I hope this explains in detail
Dear Marie
I want you to know that your urgent response to my proposal is well
appreciated. Let me briefly explain to you how I intend to handle this
project. Sequel to my previous letter I sent to you, I have perfected the
modality for the claim of this policy. Considering that you share the same
last name with my deceased client, you stand the best chance of securing
this transaction with me. You should also know that it does not necessarily
matter whether you are related to my deceased client or not. I am in the
best position to present the next of kin. I have access to information and
partners inside the insurance company.
I must first of all highlight to you that all I want from you in this
transaction is sincerity and absolute confidentiality. I shall be preparing
a letter of presentation to the court, notifying them that we are ready for
the claim.  I shall handle all legal processes and day to day check up with
the firm as it concerns documentation. This is only necessary based on the
fact that there was no will left behind by our deceased client.
Secondly, I want you to know that there are legal procedures to follow in a
transaction of this nature, there won’t be any problem for you or me, I
have a team of very good lawyers with many years of experience, you can be
sure that I know what to do, and how to go about this transaction. I
implore you to keep this transaction to yourself only. I believe with your
cooperation and collaboration, we will actualize our objectives. I will
proceed to prepare the letter of presentation to the court to grant us
authorization for the claim due to many years of his death and I will send
you all copies, however I need the below details for the same.
Your full names:
Address:
Direct phone numbers:
Age:
Marital status:
Occupation:
This information certifies we are working together, and also gives me the
liberty to furnish you with confidential documents too. For the claims I
once again assure you 100% Risk free and I will legally handle the process
of this business till the conclusion, and you should reassure me that you
will keep the transaction 100% confidential between me and you alone.
Most times the insurance companies preferred to have this fund with them
and turn it over for as many years as they can and possibly convert it to
their funds if no claim is made for a long time, so they can actually
frustrate moves to claim this kind of funds when not properly planned
because the insurance companies never want to pay. I have been following up
on this for year and will have to just use a smart way by applying for this
claim through the court and get court approval and then make direct payment
claim to the pay-out bank, this process will only make us deal with the
court and pay-out bank and Secure this claim in a very short time.
I expect a steady communication with you, so I will require a direct
contact number too, feel free to call me anytime or email me any question
you might like to ask.  Looking forward to hearing from you and getting the
above information from you to proceed.
Sincerely,
Peter
